Module jBomberman
Package model

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Figure, GameCharacter
public abstract class Entity extends Object
Class that establishes the basis of any object that directly or indirectly determines the fate of a game scene.
